title: [Health] In U.S., alcohol use disorder linked to 232 million missed workdays annually: Among U.S. adults working full time, an estimated 9% — almost 11 million full-time workers — met the diagnostic criteria for alcohol use disorder.
[Medicine] Promising antibody cocktail takes on Ebola virus—and its deadly cousin: Researchers are designing better therapies for treating Ebola virus and its deadly relatives
